item.name: rdp_config
item.caption: RDP
item.descript: Chip protection option byte. The read protection is used to protect the software code stored in Flash memory

item.name: rdp
item.caption: RDP_LEVEL
item.descript: This read protection helps the user protect the software code stored in flash memory.

item.name: user_config
item.caption: USER
item.descript: BOR reset level

item.name: bor_lev
item.caption: BOR_LEVEL
item.descript: These bits contain the supply voltage threshold needed to release the reset signal. By writing to these bits,New Bor-level values can be programmed into Flash

item.name: wdg_sw
item.caption: WDG_SW
item.descript: System watchdog Setting

item.name: nrst_stop
item.caption: nRST_STOP
item.descript: System reset Setting

item.name: nrst_stdby
item.caption: nRST_STDBY
item.descript: System standby Setting

item.name: sector0
item.caption: Sector0
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector
